assets.heading: Brand Assets
assets.usageText: Always use DiveFive with a capital F. Maintain clear space, do not distort, and avoid unauthorized color changes.

storeMeta.subtitle: Professional dive logging
storeMeta.promo: Professional dive logging app by divers, for divers. Track underwater adventures with analytics, safety monitoring, and dive site management. Perfect for all divers.
storeMeta.description:
DiveFive is the comprehensive dive logging app designed for serious divers who want to track, analyze, and improve their diving performance.

KEY FEATURES:

COMPREHENSIVE DIVE LOGGING
â€¢ Log essential dive data: depth, duration, temperature, visibility
â€¢ Track equipment and gas mixtures
â€¢ Record dive sites with GPS coordinates
â€¢ Add detailed notes and ratings

ADVANCED ANALYTICS
â€¢ Career overview with total dives and bottom time
â€¢ Track your deepest dive and diving progress
â€¢ Analyze dive patterns and trends
â€¢ Safety statistics and completion tracking

DIVE SITE MANAGEMENT
â€¢ Interactive maps with dive site locations
â€¢ Build your personal dive site database
â€¢ Search and discover new dive sites
â€¢ Site-specific analytics and history

DATA IMPORT & EXPORT
â€¢ Import dive computer data (UDDF format)
â€¢ Export your dive logs for backup
â€¢ Seamless data migration and sharing

MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT
â€¢ Available in English and Spanish
â€¢ Localized for diving communities worldwide

DESIGNED FOR DIVERS, BY DIVERS
DiveFive focuses on what matters most to diving enthusiasts - comprehensive data tracking, safety monitoring, and helping you become a better diver through detailed analysis of your underwater adventures.

Whether you're a recreational diver logging weekend trips or a technical diver tracking complex profiles, DiveFive provides the reliable tools you need to maintain detailed dive records.

Start your diving journey with DiveFive and take your logbook digital.
